title: Product manager
skills:
My skills summary: 

Business and System Analysis skills: 
•	Experience of requirements elicitation and analysing
•	Skilled in designing process models using UML (Activity diagram), ARIS (EPC), BPMN, IDEF0, Flowcharts, DFD
•	Experience of use-case modelling (UML) 
•	Knowledge of BABOK techniques 
•	Experience of UX design (wireframes)

Technologies and Software: 
•	Microsoft products: Microsoft Project, MS Word, MS Excel, MS Access, PowerPoint, Visio and Outlook
•	Query language: SQL ( MySQL) 
•	Web programming languages: HTML, XHTML, PHP, Java Script, XML, CSS
•	Data Visualization: Processing 
•	PDM/PLM/ERP systems: SAP, SmarTeam(Dassault Systemes/IBM), Windchill(PTC)
•	Project management tools: Jira, Trello, Confluence, Wrike
•	Programming languages: C++ (basic), Java  (basic), VBA

experience.description:
Duties:

•	Develop key CX key metrics for digital experience, including NPS, CSAT, CSI
•	Manage customer feedback and present it as insights to product teams
•	Qualitative research, including research design, sampling, analysis and presentations
•	Development of CX Culture via knowledge-sharing meet-ups, creation of company manifest with client-oriented values and design of motivation program for employees.

Duties: 
•	Organizing and holding requirements workshops with internal stakeholders
•	Designing Requirements Specifications (user stories)
•	Guiding design team and verifying mock-ups
•	Consulting development and QA teams
•	Participation in the acceptance of developed functionality
•	Development of user documentation (for stakeholders and call-center specialists)
•      Designing an internal knowledgebase 
•      Hiring and training BAs (Agile ambassador)
•      Establishment of work processes and organizing training programs 


Achievements: 
•	Established regulations of BA team work in the company
•	A number of successful projects aimed to improve service quality and efficiency (redesign, change of suppliers, extend of the platform solutions as an API for external users).
•       A number of projects for product range extention and sale growth (cross-sell, upsell and postsell products distribution)
•	Projects aimed to reduce operational costs (ticket exchange and refund automatization)
•	Transition to Agile
•	Enrich a corporate Confluence-based knowledgebase

industries.name: Интернет-компания (поисковики, платежные системы, соц.сети, информационно-познавательные и развлекательные ресурсы, продвижение сайтов и прочее)
